name: IFPMA Clinical Trials Portal
overview:
IFPMA Clinical Trials Portal is brought to you by IFPMA on behalf of its Member Companies and Associations.

IFPMA Clinical Trials Portal ensures: -A free and easy-to-use interface for patients and health professionals alike to ongoing clinical trials, clinical trial results and complementary information on related issues. -Non-promotional and reliable information. -Industry’s commitment to the transparency of clinical trials.

Basic Search Features: -Search by Medical Condition and Drug Name -Language Interfaces (En, Es, Fr, De, Jp) -Glossary and Easy Explanation of Medical Expressions -Geographical Search

Myportal: -Create and save up to six search queries -Repeat these queries whenever you wish -Receive an e-mail alert when a new matching trial is posted

Key Documents: -Newsletter -Press Releases -Joint position on the Disclosure of Clinical Trial Information -Useful Tips -Video Tour -FAQs -Pediatric FAQs -Glossary
